name: Awesome Platformer Adventure
description:
How to play: 

Use A and D to Move

Die a lot.

Use the Space bar to Jump.

Die a lot.

Collect the star in each level to end it and go to the next using the Space bar.

Die a lot.

Press R to restart the current level.

Die a lot.

Collect 10 coins per level to do a full Run.

Die a lot.

Play through 10 levels with scaling difficulty each individually made by me.

Die a lot.
